message:
First off, thanks for this post, I've read it several times over the last few months, and it's very illuminating.
I've seen a bit of conflation where people have taken this article to mean that `ConfigureAwait(false)` is not useful in `.NET Core` as a whole, as opposed to just `ASP.NETCORE`, and while I understand the distinction, I'm still left wondering - What scenarios in `.NET Core` will actually be affected by your `ConfigureAwait` decision?

It seems like `ASP.NET` was the biggest offender, which is why people may have lept to the conclusion that it's not needed at all anymore?
